title: Authorizes local social services districts to choose which state- but not federally-required medicaid services to provide and categories of eligibility to cover
summary: Authorizes local social services to choose which state-required but not federally-required medicaid services to provide to eligible persons and which categories of eligibility to cover; directs the commissioner of health to apply for necessary waivers, promulgate rules and regulations, and establish necessary procedures.

       AN  ACT  to amend the social services law, in relation to allowing local
